title: Disconnecting issue with lol
body: I got a problem when I play lol since yesterday. For every SINGLE game, i disconnect ONCE for 20-30 seconds, and then come back in game perfectly fine, super annoying :(. I'm pretty sure it's not my internet issue since I can alt-tab and open websites normally. Help!!!

replies.body:
Hey there,

Are you still experiencing this issue?

Could you do the following for me;

* [Download WinMTR](https://sourceforge.net/projects/winmtr/files/WinMTR-v092.zip/download) and run a traceroute to the following IP. (Allow this to run for 5-15 minutes)
  * 103.240.227.5
* Once adequate time has passed, stop the traceroute, export your results as text.
* Run the [ICSI netalyzr](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/).
* Post back with a link to your WinMTR results (You can use [pastebin](http://pastebin.com/) for this) and the url to your ICSI netalyzr results.
Could you please re-run the above MTR, as when you ran it originally there were known connectivity issues with the OCE server.
